# sortDescriptors

**Instance Property**

The sort descriptors that specify the order of the results returned by this query.

## Declaration

```swift
var sortDescriptors: [NSSortDescriptor]? { get }
```

## Getting Property Data

- **limit**: The maximum number of samples that this query returns.

items.description: The maximum number of samples that this query returns.
items.name: limit
